title: Glenn Close And Stephen Bond Over Their Favorite Film
description:
The amazing Glenn Close returned to The Late Show to teach Stephen a little Farsi she picked up while filming the Israeli spy series, "Tehran," and to chat about their shared love for the 1966 film, “A Man For All Seasons.” Watch Glenn in Season 2 of “Tehran” on AppleTV+.
